Tensor Descriptor¶

Created on Mon Mar 12 09:40:00 2018

@author: Diego Britez

class tensor_descriptor_class.TensorDescriptor(tshape, dim)[source]¶

TensorDescriptor is a class that contains basic information that other classes (Full Format, CanonicalForme) will inherit.

Attributes

_tshape: array like, with the numbers of elements that each 1-rank tensor is going to discretize each subspace of the full tensor.

dim: integer type, number that represent the n-rank tensor that is going to be represented. The value of dim must be coherent with the size of _tshape parameter.
